title: Agentic AI Master Notebook
description: Complete production-ready reference and bootstrap tool for building agentic AI systems. Includes OpenAI Agents SDK, CrewAI, MCP servers, LangGraph, and deployment templates.

inputs.name: api_keys
inputs.notes: Optional: API keys for OpenAI, Anthropic, etc. Pack works without keys for structure generation.

outputs.name: project_structure
outputs.notes: Complete project structure metadata with folders and files

outputs.name: agent_configs
outputs.notes: Pre-configured agent templates (research, coding, general, support)

outputs.name: execution_summary
outputs.notes: Detailed execution report with generated components and next steps

outputs.name: project_directory
outputs.notes: Complete project directory with source folders, config files, and templates
